title: Patch 3.12 Constrained Mouse
body:
So for Patch 3.12, there is one major issue.
"While playing in windowed mode your mouse cursor will be constrained to the game window regardless if the options menu is open or not"
This is unnecessary. It just compromises the mobility of Windows or whatnot, and I think it needs to be changed immediately. I understand it helps players stay focused on playing and not AFKing for 20 seconds at base. But....no. I am requesting a change to this feature.

replies.body: Oh my. Did not see. That really helped. Thnaks
You can press F9 to remove your mouse constraint. We didn't remove the feature, just decoupled it from the options menu.

But can you rebind it? i would have trouble pressing F9 in the first place because of how far it is from qwer and that i need to hold ALT for it to work because i'm on a laptop. I don't think it would be hard to add a binding option and it would really help out since the mouse constraint update has messed up my multitasking.
